mapper.select: select TRAVELID as travelId, MAXFIVE as maxFive, TRAVEL_NAME as travelName, TRAVEL_LOCATION as travelLocation, TRAVEL_DESCRIPTION as travelDescription, TRAVEL_IMAGE as travelImage, BAD as bad from travel where TRAVELID = #{travelId}
SELECT travelId, travel_name, travel_location, travel_description, travel_image FROM travel WHERE maxFive = #{maxFive} limit 3
SELECT bad FROM travel WHERE maxFive = #{maxFive} limit 1
SELECT travelId, travel_name, travel_location, travel_description, travel_image FROM travel WHERE maxFive = #{bad} limit 3
